casebody.data:
NEW MEXICO, plaintiff,
v.
COLORADO. No. 147, Original Supreme Court of the United States June 26, 2017.

Motion for leave to file a bill of complaint denied. Justice THOMAS and Justice ALITO would grant the motion for the reasons stated in Nebraska v. Colorado, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1034, 194 L.Ed.2d 545 (2016) (Thomas, J., dissenting).
